verses.verse: בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> On that night הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he נָדְדָ֖ה <WH5074> could not שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8142> sleep הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he commanded לְהָבִ֞יא <WH935> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> the book הַזִּכְרֹנוֹת֙ <WH2146> of records דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> act הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> age וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become נִקְרָאִ֖ים <WH7121> and they were read לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיִּמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> And it was found כָת֗וּב <WH3789> written אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> what הִגִּ֨יד <WH5046> had told מָרְדֳּכַ֜י <WH4782> that Mordecai עַל־ <WH5921> concerning בִּגְתָ֣נָא <WH904> of Bigthana וָתֶ֗רֶשׁ <WH8657> and Teresh שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> two סָרִיסֵ֣י <WH5631> chamberlains הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's מִשֹּׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> the keepers הַסַּ֑ף <WH5592> of the door אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> what בִּקְשׁוּ֙ <WH1245> who sought לִשְׁלֹ֣חַ <WH7971> to lay יָ֔ד <WH3027> hand בַּמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> on the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH325> Ahasuerus

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מַֽה־ <WH4100> What נַּעֲשָׂ֞ה <WH6213> hath been done יְקָ֧ר <WH3366> What honour וּגְדוּלָּ֛ה <WH1420> and dignity לְמָרְדֳּכַ֖י <WH4782> to Mordecai עַל־ <WH5921> and זֶ֑ה <WH2088> him וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> for this? Then said נַעֲרֵ֤י <WH5288> servants הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king's מְשָׁ֣רְתָ֔יו <WH8334> that ministered לֹא־ <WH3808> not נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> done עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> There דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> unto him There is nothing

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מִ֣י <WH4310> Who בֶחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> court וְהָמָ֣ן <WH2001> Haman בָּ֗א <WH935> was come לַחֲצַ֤ר <WH2691> court בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king's הַחִ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <WH2435> into the outward לֵאמֹ֣ר <WH559> to speak לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king לִתְלוֹת֙ <WH8518> to hang אֶֽת־ <WH853> מָרְדֳּכַ֔י <WH4782> Mordecai עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> on the gallows אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵכִ֥ין <WH3559> that he had prepared לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said נַעֲרֵ֤י <WH5288> servants הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king's אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold הָמָ֖ן <WH2001> unto him Behold Haman עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> standeth בֶּחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> in the court וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> Let him come in

וַיָּבוֹא֮ <WH935> came in הָמָן֒ <WH2001> So Haman וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מַה־ <WH4100> What לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> unto him What shall be done בָּאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> unto the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> whom the king חָפֵ֣ץ <WH2654> delighteth בִּיקָר֑וֹ <WH3366> honour וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> thought הָמָן֙ <WH2001> Haman בְּלִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> in his heart לְמִ֞י <WH4310> Whom יַחְפֹּ֥ץ <WH2654> delight הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> To whom would the king לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do יְקָ֖ר <WH3366> to honor יוֹתֵ֥ר <WH3148> more מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> than

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> answered הָמָ֖ן <WH2001> And Haman אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> For the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> whom the king חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> delighteth בִּיקָרֽוֹ׃ <WH3366> to honour

יָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> be brought לְב֣וּשׁ <WH3830> apparel מַלְכ֔וּת <WH4438> Let the royal אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לָֽבַשׁ־ <WH3847> [useth] to wear בּ֖וֹ הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> which the king וְס֗וּס <WH5483> and the horse אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which רָכַ֤ב <WH7392> rideth עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose נִתַּ֛ן <WH5414> which is set כֶּ֥תֶר <WH3804> upon and the crown מַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> royal בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> upon his head

וְנָת֨וֹן <WH5414> be delivered הַלְּב֜וּשׁ <WH3830> And let this apparel וְהַסּ֗וּס <WH5483> and horse עַל־ <WH5921> and יַד־ <WH3027> to the hand אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> of one מִשָּׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> princes הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king's הַֽפַּרְתְּמִ֔ים <WH6579> most noble וְהִלְבִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <WH3847> that they may array אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [withal] whom the king חָפֵ֣ץ <WH2654> delighteth בִּֽיקָר֑וֹ <WH3366> to honour וְהִרְכִּיבֻ֤הוּ <WH7392> and bring עַל־ <WH5921> on הַסּוּס֙ <WH5483> him on horseback בִּרְח֣וֹב <WH7339> through the street הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְקָרְא֣וּ <WH7121> and proclaim לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before כָּ֚כָה <WH3602> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> him Thus shall it be done לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> to the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> whom the king חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> delighteth בִּיקָרֽוֹ׃ <WH3366> to honour

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king לְהָמָ֗ן <WH2001> to Haman מַ֠הֵר <WH4116> Make haste קַ֣ח <WH3947> [and] take אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְּב֤וּשׁ <WH3830> the apparel וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסּוּס֙ <WH5483> and the horse כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you דִּבַּ֔רְתָּ <WH1696> as thou hast said וַֽעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do כֵן֙ <WH3651> so לְמָרְדֳּכַ֣י <WH4782> even so to Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֔י <WH3064> the Jew הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that sitteth בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> at the king's אַל־ <WH408> not תַּפֵּ֣ל <WH5307> fail דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> let nothing מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> of all that thou hast spoken

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> Then took הָמָן֙ <WH2001> Haman אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְּב֣וּשׁ <WH3830> the apparel וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסּ֔וּס <WH5483> and the horse וַיַּלְבֵּ֖שׁ <WH3847> and arrayed אֶֽת־ <WH853> מָרְדֳּכָ֑י <WH4782> Mordecai וַיַּרְכִּיבֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7392> and brought him on horseback בִּרְח֣וֹב <WH7339> through the street הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and proclaimed לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before כָּ֚כָה <WH3602> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> him Thus shall it be done לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> whom the king חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> delighteth בִּיקָרֽוֹ׃ <WH3366> to honour

וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> came again מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <WH4782> And Mordecai אֶל־ <WH413> about שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king's וְהָמָן֙ <WH2001> But Haman נִדְחַ֣ף <WH1765> hasted אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> to his house אָבֵ֖ל <WH57> mourning וַחֲפ֥וּי <WH2645> covered רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> and having his head

וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <WH5608> told הָמָ֜ן <WH2001> And Haman לְזֶ֤רֶשׁ <WH2238> Zeresh אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH802> his wife וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֹ֣הֲבָ֔יו <WH157> and all his friends אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom קָרָ֑הוּ <WH7136> every [thing] that had befallen וַיֹּ֩אמְרוּ֩ <WH559> him Then said ל֨וֹ חֲכָמָ֜יו <WH2450> his wise men וְזֶ֣רֶשׁ <WH2238> and Zeresh אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> his wife אִ֣ם <WH518> If מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> [be] of the seed הַיְּהוּדִ֡ים <WH3064> of the Jews מָרְדֳּכַ֞י <WH4782> unto him If Mordecai אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הַחִלּ֨וֹתָ <WH2490> whom thou hast begun לִנְפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> to fall לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before לֹא־ <WH3808> you will not תוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> thou shalt not prevail ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> but נָפ֥וֹל <WH5307> against him but shalt surely תִּפּ֖וֹל <WH5307> fall לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

עוֹדָם֙ <WH5750> were still מְדַבְּרִ֣ים <WH1696> And while they [were] yet talking עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וְסָרִיסֵ֥י <WH5631> chamberlains הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's הִגִּ֑יעוּ <WH5060> with him came וַיַּבְהִ֙לוּ֙ <WH926> and hasted לְהָבִ֣יא <WH935> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> הָמָ֔ן <WH2001> Haman אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> unto the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> had prepared אֶסְתֵּֽר׃ <WH635> that Esther
